name: device_startCourse
description: This function is used to initiate a specific mode or course on a SmartThings device.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to initiate the mode or course.

parameters.name: groupAction
parameters.description: The group action for initiating the mode or course.

parameters.name: temperatureUnit
parameters.description: The unit of temperature for the mode or course.

parameters.name: temperature
parameters.description: The temperature value for the mode or course.

parameters.name: duration
parameters.description: The duration for the mode or course.

parameters.name: weight
parameters.description: The weight value for the mode or course.

parameters.name: weightUnit
parameters.description: The unit of weight for the mode or course.

parameters.name: number
parameters.description: An integer value for the mode or course.

parameters.name: predefinedCompartment
parameters.description: The predefined compartment for the mode or course.
